In the far reaches of the solar system, a metallic object arrived at 
an amazingly fast speed. In all the bases on Earth, the warning 
systems must have been going crazy upon detecting the object. Its 
trajectory took it to the moon only a few minutes later. The landing 
caused the formation of an immense crater. There, at its center, 
Meteara, the second Vok emissary, stood. She was huge, with immense 
thrusters in her back, a big pincer folding over her left arm and what 
seemed to be a destructive weapon on her right arm.

Meteara: I will wait for those intruders to signal themselves again. 
Then, they will know the wrath of the Vok!
